title: "Hey Google" won't work on Google Pixel 4a when any kind of audio is playing (Spotify, YouTube, etc)
content: Whenever I am playing any kind of audio (Spotify, YouTube, etc..) with my Google Pixel 4a, I am unable to activate Google assistant with my voice. Even if I have the phone in my hand and scream, it won't work. Is there something I can do? I have tried updates, turning assistant on/off, restarting phone, etc..
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
